name: Life or Death 2: Legend of Doomsday
name_original: Life or Death 2: Legend of Doomsday
description:
Life or Death 2: Legend of Doomsday is a strategy game developed by EagleFly. It was originally released in 2000. EagleFly published the game.
You can play Life or Death 2: Legend of Doomsday on PC.
